entries.content: No is very good because it allows you to take them out of your prospecting campaign.
entries.notes: Emphasizes objections as valuable feedback, not rejections.

entries.content: A negative reply (no) is a really good piece of data to narrow the field of unfit prospects.
Objections (no) help identify who is not a fit, saving time and effort.
No is very good and remember in the age of hashtag me too is ever more important.
entries.notes: Humorous but reinforces the value of clear objections.

focus_area: Objection Mindset: Objections = info requests, not rejections
